summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 26th Avenue North, from East Prospect Street on the west to East Galer Street; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14763 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
